content:
Trigger The agents reach a multiple of 5 Awareness Points for the first time while in the casino.

Overcome DC 27 Performance or DC 29 Diplomacy or Intimidation

The agents have garnered some unwanted attention from overeager blowhards and schmoozers. These gadabouts are all too eager to dominate the agents' time with incessant blathering or questions that might blow their cover.
name: Aggressive Minglers
